question: Your next-door neighbor likes to listen to music late at night. Because of the loud music, you often lose sleep.Write a letter to your neighbor. In your letterDescribe the situationExplain the problem it is causing youOffer at least one solution
text: I am Ben residing in  flat number 208 on the 8th floor.I am writing this letter to inform you regarding any inconvenience caused to my daily sleep.

My neighbour Willam,staying at flat number 209 is a music lover and he is playing  music at a loud volume,which affects my family's sleep routine.I have requested him many times to reduce the volume but unfortunately, he is doing some research works on music which  force him to keep the volume high .My wife is 3 months pregnant and she is working as well.This noisy environment causes so many difficulties for her as well however ,I do not want to interrupt Willam as well.I would be grateful if you could make that side of my house walls  soundproof.
Appreciate it if you could suggest any alternative solutions for this.Looking forward to hearing from you and happy to discuss further on this.
